entry.def: If something has been roughened, its surface has become less smooth.

example.ex: ...complexions that have been roughened by long periods in the hot sun...
example.tran: 因长期曝晒而变得粗糙的皮肤

example.ex: She lifted her big, roughened hands.
example.tran: 她举起了那双粗糙的大手。

sentences.sentence: "rough the surfaces so they will stick to each other"

auth_sentence.content: That girl's...nature seemed to roughen itself against seeing us so bound up in Pet.
